block_comment: The block of code handles memory parameterization for a Xilinx FPGA. Primarily, it includes different parameter files for a specific module, 'xs6_sram_1024x128_byte_en', based on the defined macros. If 'BOOT_MEM128_PARAMS_FILE' macro is defined, the associated file is included, whereas in its absence, the code checks if 'BOOT_LOADER_ETHMAC' is defined and, if so, includes the 'boot-loader-ethmac_memparams128.v' file. Otherwise, the default 'boot-loader_memparams128.v' file is included, ensuring appropriate memory parameter configuration.
